description:
Having found the farm completely rotted, Midge convinces Doc and Marbo that their only option left is to get off the space station and go back to Earth. The trio begin to make their way to the space dock to find a way home, but are surprised to learn they`re not the only things still alive on the space station. Now the bugs have to find a way home and somehow avoid being eaten by Geroppa the frog general and his two lackeys.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gerogero Dai Soudou / Juuryoku wa Tsurai yo
ゲロゲロ大騒動 / 重力はつらいよ
